title: Can we PLEASE just have GD back?
body: What's the point of forcing boards on us? If it's so much better, most people will be on it, right? It seems you are forcing us to use boards because you know we will keep using GD, which isn't fair. If that isn't the case, why not just let us have GD - the "few" that will use it won't matter, right?

replies.body:
This board is circlejerk cancer.

It is also eye cancer.
Yes, everyone is circle jerking about how much they hate it. Guess its GD in a nutshell

Currently we are locking all current discussion about board feedback.

In the last 24 hours we have had hundreds of threads to communicate issues about the boards, due to this we are requesting you post all comments to this mega thread - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/lLiAKid9-boards-feedback-mega-discussion

Please go ahead and post your constructive comments over on that discussion.

Shutting down GD and forcing everyone onto this... board... is not the right way to do it. Boards got a bad rep before it launched because of how it was handled and shown to everyone. Make them like it more and allow them to transition more gradually to it instead of just pulling the plug and creating even more hate for this place.

Sure they'll get over it eventually, but this way makes that take a lot longer than it could have.
Not really? You contradicted yourself. You said take it slow and easy for people to adapt, but then said its short. The instant transition is in comparison much faster.
lol they moved the "I Hate Boards" to Miscellaneous.  At least the mods are the same.

I get the feeling that riot does not want me here :( they have made a "forum" which literally hurts my eyes.  I visit Reddit for Reddit, and I went to GD for an actual forum.   WHY HAVE YOU DONE  THIS  TO ME RIOT... HAVE I ANGERED YOU???

Boards are effing garbage.

I hate EVERYTHING about them.

Riot: "I can be dark and brooding, oh look a rainbow!(sion)" *proceeds to force opinions and boards on said rainbow until this rainbow believes itself to be Darius and develops the worlds worst dark and gritty accent.* Yay Darius 2.0!
